CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: It is found that PCDSeBT simultaneously has a low - lying highest occupied molecular orbital ( HOMO ) energy level at -5.4 eV and a low bandgap of 1.70 eV as required by the ideal polymers for BHJ PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDSeBT: This is the name of the material mentioned in the paragraph. It is a specific type of polymer (poly(3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate) with a side chain of benzothiadiazole and selenophenone). The name "PCDSeBT" can be considered as a single entity in this context.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.
1. PCDSeBT: This is the name of the material mentioned in the paragraph. It is a specific type of polymer used in BHJ PSCs (Bulk Heterojunction Perovskite Solar Cells).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: It is found that PCDSeBT simultaneously has a low - lying highest occupied molecular orbital ( HOMO ) energy level at -5.4 eV and a low bandgap of 1.70 eV as required by the ideal polymers for BHJ PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

1. HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital)
2. -5.4 eV (energy level of HOMO)
3. bandgap
4. 1.70 eV (value of bandgap)

So, the Property Name entities in the paragraph are HOMO energy level, -5.4 eV, bandgap, and 1.70 eV.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. HOMO energy level
2. -5.4 eV
3. bandgap
4. 1.70 eV

These are the Material Property entities in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
| HOMO energy level |
| -5.4 eV |
| bandgap |
| 1.70 eV |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: It is found that PCDSeBT simultaneously has a low - lying highest occupied molecular orbital ( HOMO ) energy level at -5.4 eV and a low bandgap of 1.70 eV as required by the ideal polymers for BHJ PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

1. HOMO energy level: This is a property value representing the energy level of the highest occupied molecular orbital in the PCDSeBT material.
2. -5.4 eV: This is a specific numerical value of the HOMO energy level in electron volts (eV).
3. Bandgap: This is a property value representing the energy difference between the conduction band and valence band in the PCDSeBT material.
4. 1.70 eV: This is a specific numerical value of the bandgap in electron volts (eV).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. HOMO energy level: -5.4 eV
2. Bandgap: 1.70 eV

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| HOMO energy level: -5.4 eV |
| Bandgap: 1.70 eV |
